message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I know you'll find valuable.  Given its potential, I'm initially suggesting a price of $950,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.

I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I believe the product has great potential, but I need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be well worth the investment. How about we meet in the middle at $900,000? This price reflects the true value of the product while still offering you a significant return.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to go up to $875,000, but I think that's as high as I can go. I'm hoping we can meet at this price and make a deal.
